feature description: urban audit code;  unique identifier of city
urban audit name or city
extent of city
extent of city
longitude in WGS84
latitude in WGS84
longitude in EPSG:3035
latitude in EPSG:3035
city outline
min - elevation of city
processing: minimum elevation within the city boundary

feature description: max - elevation of city
processing: maximum elevation within the city boundary

feature description: standard deviation - elevation of city
processing: standard deviation of elevation within the city boundary

feature description: mean elevation of city
processing: mean elevation within the city boundary

feature description: environmental zone code
processing: the environmental zone in which the majority of the city surface lays
remarks: list of codes and names in environmental_zones_codelist.csv

feature description: share of sealed area
processing: sum of sealed area/total area of the city. Sum of sealed area is computed as sum(% value*cell area). Cell area is =100m

feature description: share of area covered by trees
processing: sum of area covered by trees/total area of the city. Sum of sealed area is computed as sum(% value*cell area). Cell area is =100m

feature description: Urban Atlas class 11100 Continuous Urban Fabric (S.L. > 80%)
processing: sum of area in class x within the city boundary. To calculate the area, Urban Atlas 2018 vector product was first rasterized to 10m resolution (CRS EPSG:3035)

feature description: share of urban green area (UA classes 11230; 11240; 14*00; 2*000; 3*000; 40000)
processing: sum of area of UA classes 11230; 11240; 14*00; 2*000; 3*000; 40000 divided by total area of city

feature description: share of urban blue area (UA class 50000)
processing: sum of area of UA class 50000 divided by the total area of city

feature description: hourly 2m temperature averaged in city over one year, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
processing: see https://github.com/FAIRiCUBE/uc1-urban-climate/blob/master/notebooks/dev/f04_climate_data/climate_indicators.ipynb

feature description: Count of summer days (>25 degrees) per year per city, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
processing: see https://github.com/FAIRiCUBE/uc1-urban-climate/blob/master/notebooks/dev/f04_climate_data/climate_indicators.ipynb

feature description: Count of tropical nights (min. temperature >20 degrees) per year per city, based on 5th gen. ECMWF Atmospheric Reanalysis model
processing: see https://github.com/FAIRiCUBE/uc1-urban-climate/blob/master/notebooks/dev/f04_climate_data/climate_indicators.ipynb

feature description: number of UTCI (Universal Thermal Climate Index)  nights by UTCI classes
processing: The night hours were first extracted from the hourly values: from locally 18h to locally 6h. In the next step, the UTCI temps were calculated within the NIGHT and transferred to UTCI classes. The number of days (nights) for each class was then calculated for each year.

feature description: whether the city lies on the coast or not. Based on EEA coast line: https://sdi.eea.europa.eu/catalogue/srv/eng/catalog.search#/metadata/9faa6ea1-372a-4826-a3c7-fb5b05e31c52
processing: The city polygon was overlaid with the Coas line polygon. If it was determined that the city was on the coast, it got a 1.
